name: Captivity (itch) (RodCar)
description:
Hi! And welcome to our game's page!

Our game is called Captivity and it's a co-op adventure, roguelike-ish game with some puzzle elements!

Gather new powers, experiment with a ton of different combinations, fight evil enemies and unravel the secret story, all while playing with a friend! What could be hidden in the shadows?

Right now the game is under heavy development, as there are some things missing or unpolished,

We hope you like it!

Creators:

  • Eduardo Skapinakis
  • Rui Melo
  • Miguel Lahera
  • Rodrigo Carvalho

Here is the link to a questionnaire that would help us a ton if you did it! It would only take 1-2 minutes and the feedback you provide will help us a lot!

Link: Captivity (google.com)
